mapper.insert: insert into question ( title, content, user_id, created_date, comment_count ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, #{created_date}, #{comment_count} )
mapper.update: update question set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, user_id = #{user_id}, created_date = #{created_date}, comment_count = #{comment_count} where id=#{id}
